name: LocalGuru
tagline: Find local Linux-guru's on a map
body:
### Welcome to LocalGuru.
This project has started as a Dutch site, aiming to put people willing to help others with Linux.

### Authors and Contributors
Founded by Ruud Beukema in 2011.
Adopted by _Nederlandse Linux Gebruikers Groep_ (i.e. Dutch National LUG), aka NLLGG.

### Support or Contact
Please open an issue on [GitHub](https://github.com/nllgg/localguru/issues)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
